release.action: Initial version with basic functionallity to deploy an os in a VM and generate an image with some installed products.

Added install application functionallity (see https://jira.tid.es/browse/CLAUDIA-197 for more information)
Added uninstall application functionallity (see https://jira.tid.es/browse/CLAUDIA-484 for more information)
